overview: ONE Fighting Championship: Dynasty of Champions (Beijing) (also known as ONE FC 24) was a mixed martial arts event held by ONE Fighting Championship. The event took place on December 19, 2014 in Beijing, China. This event marked the first visit of ONE to China. The event was originally scheduled to take place on October 31, 2014 but the organization made the announcement to move it days leading up to the event.
title: ONE Championship 24: Dynasty of Champions (Beijing)
